snippet: The countries are the main allies pushing for greater protection for the bears under a global treaty on endangered species, which is being reviewed at a conference in Bangkok.
abstract: Russia and United States are main allies pushing for greater protection for polar bears under global treaty on endangered species that is being reviewed at Bangkok conference; Russia's decision to cooperate with US not only defies recent wave of anti-Americanism, but reverses its opposition to similar American proposal three years ago.
